means: 颌针鱼（一种长嘴便鳞的海鱼）

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在大西洋和美国的海湾海岸附近发现的颌针鱼(needlefish)(一种长嘴遍鳞的海鱼)和鱼箴科鱼(halfbeak)(一种下颚特别长的鱼)经常被误认为是雀鳝。 长吻雀鳝的.
Kymograph Muscle Contraction ... needle valve 针形阀 needlefish 针鱼，突嘴颔针鱼 needle-mackerel 中华九刺鱼.
...欧洲腭针鱼腭针鱼(needlefish)的欧洲种属银汉鱼目(Atheriniformes)腭针鱼科(Belonidae)欧洲腭针鱼分布于整个.

means.word_mean: 1. elongate European surface-dwelling predacious fishes with long toothed jaws; abundant in coastal waters
2. fish with long tubular snout and slim body covered with bony plates

auth_sentence.content: Most are marine, though a few needlefish and halfbeaks inhabit brackish and fresh waters.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most are marine, though a few needlefish and halfbeaks inhabit brackish and fresh waters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most are marine, though a few needlefish and halfbeaks inhabit brackish and fresh waters.
